title: Police won’t be charged in death of Amir Locke, Black man shot during no-knock warrant - NBC News
content:
1. Police won’t be charged in death of Amir Locke, Black man shot during no-knock warrant  NBC News
  2. Amir Locke shooting: No charges against Minneapolis police officer; Locke's mother addresses media  FOX 5 New York
  3. Minneapolis officer who fatally shot Amir Locke in SWAT raid will not be charged  Fox News
  4. Officer Mark Hanneman had been on SWAT assignment three days before shooting Locke  Star Tribune
  5. No charges will be filed in fatal police shooting of Amir Locke, killed during no-knock warrant service  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: “There is insufficient admissible evidence to file criminal charges in this case,” Hennepin County Attorney Michael Freeman and Minnesota Attorney General Keith Ellison said.
